title: The invincible vveapon or truths triumph over errors, by vvhich all the true bred sonnes of the Church, may obtain strength to vvithstand the desperate tenents that have been broached, whereby the godly of our times may be fore-warned and fore-armed against their soul enemies.
publicationStmtPublisher: Are to be sold by Ro. Walton at the west end of Pauls,
